mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AbilityDonation ( ADNAME, MANAGERNAME, PHONENUM, INTRODUCTION, DONATIONDATE, PROGRESSTIME, CURRHC, PLACE, SHARINGCONTENTS) VALUES (#{adName},#{managerName},#{phoneNum},#{introduction},#{donationDate},#{progressTime},#{currHc},#{place},#{sharingContents})
mapper.select: SELECT ADNAME, MANAGERNAME, PHONENUM, INTRODUCTION, DONATIONDATE, PROGRESSTIME, CURRHC, PLACE, SHARINGCONTENTS FROM AbilityDonation
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AbilityDonation WHERE ADNAME=#{adName} AND MANAGERNAME=#{managerName}
